title: Cardi B Takes Down Celebrity Gossip YouTuber in Court
description:
Cardi B won a monumental multi-million dollar defamation lawsuit against celebrity gossip YouTuber Tasha K. Tasha made numerous videos accusing Cardi of using drugs, having STI’s and even said Cardi’s daughter Kulture would have “intellectual disabilities” due to Cardi’s lifestyle. So, Cardi took her to court. Tune in to hear about the lawsuit and Cardi’s victory!

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/legallyjudgy
LinkTree: https://linktr.ee/legallyjudgy
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
